history.proof: qsimpl time: 2 use: incr_unital_iff_residual. qsimpl time: 2 use: incr_unital_iff_residual,Build_IncreasingSeparationAlgebra. qsimpl time: 2 use: incr_unital_iff_residual,Build_IncreasingSeparationAlgebra,all_increasing.
